Articles.Content: Hey all, I'm new to KSP and love it! Been following Scott Manley's tips on Youtube and managed to get to Duna today. But unfortunately the landing was a bit rough and I destroyed 2 engines and I'm almost out of fuel so it looks like my Kerbals are staying there!

Welcome aboard! That's quite an accomplishment- I've only ever landed on Duna once before...

You're going to fit right in here
Welcome aboard- Any landing you can walk away from is a good landing!
Congrats on Duna! I've never been there on my own. And welcome!
